channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Firstpost
item.description: From too much love of living, From hope and fear set free, We thank with brief thanksgiving, Whatever gods may be, That no life lives forever, That dead men rise up never, That even the weariest river winds somewhere safe to sea. – Swinburne New screensaver released: Curtains for Windows. A strong conviction that something must be done is the parent of many bad measures. – Daniel Webster Ho! Tom Bombadil, Tom Bombadillo!
